sen.j: 寺戸大塚古墳（てらどおおつかこふん）は、京都府向日市の西ノ岡（向日丘陵）に所在する。
sen.e: Terado Otsuka-kofun Tumulus is situated in Nishinooka (Muko Hills), Muko City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Terado Otsuka-kofun Tumulus is situated in Nishinooka (Muko Hills), Muko City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Terado Otsuka-kofun Tumulus is situated in Nishinooka (Muko-kyuryo Hills), Muko City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 古墳時代前期の前方後円墳である。
sen.e: It a keyhole-shaped mound built in the early Kofun (Tumulus) period.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It a keyhole-shaped mound built in the early Kofun (Tumulus) period.
It is a keyhole-shaped mound built in the early Kofun (Tumulus) period.

sen.j: 向日丘陵古墳群中の1基。
sen.e: The Terado Otsuka Tumulus is one of the tumuli in Muko Hills.
The Terado Otsuka Tumulus is one of the tumuli in Muko Hills.
The Terado Otsuka-kofun Tumulus is one of the tumuli in Muko-kyuryo Hills.
sen.cmt: 前出用語に合わせました。

sen.j: 築造時期は古墳時代前期中葉とみられている。
sen.e: It appears to have been constructed in the middle of the early Kofun period.
It appears to have been constructed in the middle of the early Kofun period.
It appears to have been constructed in the middle of the early Kofun (tumulus) period.

sen.j: やや西に傾いており、前方、後円ともに竪穴式石室をもつ。
sen.e: It is slightly tilted west with a pit rock chamber in both the front square and the back circular part.
It is slightly tilted west with a pit rock chamber in both the front square and the back circular part.
It is slightly tilted west with a pit rock chamber in both the front square and the back circular part.

sen.j: 出土した三角縁神獣鏡が椿井大塚山古墳のものと同氾関係にあると見られる。
sen.e: A triangular-rimmed mirror excavated in the tumulus seems to be in an isomorphic relationship with the one from the Tsubaiotsukayama-kofun Tumulus.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: A triangular-rimmed mirror excavated in the tumulus seems to be in an isomorphic relationship with the one from the Tsubaiotsukayama-kofun Tumulus.
A triangular-rimmed mirror excavated in the tumulus seems to be in an isomorphic relationship with the one from the Tsubai Otsukayama-kofun Tumulus.
sen.cmt: 他用語と表記を合わせました。

sen.j: 椿井大塚山古墳の被葬者の支配下にあった者の墓ではないかと言われている。
sen.e: This suggests that the one who was buried in the Terado Otsuka Tumulus may have been a subject of the buried in the Tsubaiotsukayama Tumulus.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: This suggests that the one who was buried in the Terado Otsuka Tumulus may have been a subject of the person buried in the Tsubaiotsukayama Tumulus.
This suggests that the one who was buried in the Terado Otsuka-kofun Tumulus may have been a subject of the person buried in the Tsubai Otsukayama-kofun Tumulus.
sen.cmt: 前出用語に合わせました。

sen.j: 現在は竹やぶの土入れにより前方部の大半が失われている。
sen.e: Most of the front part is lost as earth has been added to the bamboo forest.
Most of the front part is lost as earth has been added to the bamboo forest.
Most of the front part is lost as earth has been added to the bamboo forest.

sen.j: 墳頂には8m四方の埴輪をめぐらせた区画があり、その真下に石室がある。
sen.e: At the top of the mound there is an 8-by-8-m square site lined with haniwa clay figurines, immediately below which the stone chamber lies.
At the top of the mound there is an 8-by-8-m square site lined with haniwa clay figurines, immediately below where the stone chamber lies.
At the top of the mound there is an eight meters square site lined with haniwa clay figures, immediately below where the stone chamber lies.

sen.j: 土師器の供献場がある。
sen.e: The tumulus has an offering place for Haji pottery.
The tumulus has an offering place for Haji pottery.
The tumulus has an offering place for Haji pottery.
The total length of the tumulus:
The total length of the tumulus:
The total length of the tumulus:

sen.cmt: ピリオドを削除しました。
ピリオドを削除しました。
ピリオドを削除しました。

sen.e: The diameter of the back circular part:
The diameter of the back circular part:
The diameter of the back circular part:

sen.cmt: ピリオドを削除しました。

sen.j: 前方部に長さ5.2m、幅1m、高さ1.3mの竪穴式石室をもつ。
sen.e: The frontal part has a pit rock chamber with 5.2 m in length, 1 m in width and 1.3 m in height.
The frontal part has a pit rock chamber with 5.2 m in length, 1 m in width and 1.3 m in height.
The frontal part has a pit rock chamber with 5.2 m in length, 1 m in width and 1.3 m in height.

sen.j: 後円部に長さ5.6m、幅0.8m、高さ1.6mの竪穴式石室をもつ。
sen.e: In the back circular part there is a pit rock chamber with the length of 5.6 m, the width of 0.8 m and the height of 1.6 m.
In the back circular part there is a pit rock chamber with the length of 5.6 m, the width of 0.8 m and the height of 1.6 m.
In the back circular part there is a pit rock chamber with the length of 5.6 m, the width of 0.8 m and the height of 1.6 m.
Mirror with a band of animal pattern in relief
Mirror with a band of animal patterns in relief
Mirror with a band of animal patterns in relief

sen.j: 三角縁獣文帯三神三獣鏡
sen.e: Triangular-rimmed mirror with three deities and three animals encircled by a band of animal pattern.
Triangular-rimmed mirror with three deities and three animals encircled by a band of animal patterns.
Triangular-rimmed mirror with three deities and three animals encircled by a band of animal patterns
sen.cmt: ピリオドを削除しました。

sen.e: Mirror with geometric patterns and the four spirits.
Mirror with geometric patterns and the four spirits.
Mirror with geometric patterns and the four spirits
